Text: Is this torrent working?  I don't see any seeders.

Finally, a screenshot.

This picture shows the original Blu-ray screen-capture as a background with this AVI file paused on the same frame in SMPlayer.

The SMPlayer window in the screenshot is at 1280x720 resolution.  You can also see here just how much of the edges had to be removed to make this conversion.  Hope this helps.
